options.placeholder: Add allowed IP addresses, IP ranges and CIDR blocks. Leave empty to allow all...
The unique name for this role...

meta.note: Optional parent role that this role inherits permissions from
Nested child roles that inherit this roles permissions

options.placeholder: A short, public message that supports markdown formatting...

meta.note: Allows users to register via the [registration route](/admin/register).
This role is assigned to users who register using this method. Does not affect already registered users.
Sends an email to the registering user asking them to click on a verification link before they can sign in.
Only email addresses matching this filter can register.
Default folder for uploaded files without a folder specified. Does not affect existing files.
The Sharp method name and its arguments. See https://sharp.pixelplumbing.com/api-constructor for more information.

options.text: Model Context Protocol is a standard for connecting LLMs to applications like Directus. Once enabled, the Directus MCP server will be available at `/mcp`. Learn more about MCP and how to connect.

meta.note: Connect AI/LLM tools to your Directus project via Model Context Protocol (MCP). This enables AI assistants to read and interact with your Directus data securely.
Enable deletion of items, files, flows, fields, relations, and collections through MCP tools. WARNING: May cause data loss. Disabled by default for safety.
Select collection for storing reusable prompt templates for AI interactions.
Use the default system prompt to guide LLM behavior. Disable to remove or override with your own prompt below.
Custom system prompt to replace the default. Leave empty to use default (if enabled above).
